Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the name of the WorkGroup. For example:

{ "Ref": "myWorkGroup" }

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The date and time the workgroup was created, as a UNIX timestamp in seconds. For example: 1582761016.
The Athena engine version for running queries, or the PySpark engine version for running sessions.
